spells.html_content:
Spells

Barricade
/ Pavise
4 Range / 2AP

Makes the targeted ally Invulnerable in Close Combat.
For 1 turn, if they receive ranged damage, increases their MP (stackable 3 times).

The MP increase is not applied if the target is under the effects of the Bastion spell.

On a free cell: summons a static shield that makes adjacent allies in its glyph-aura Invulnerable in Close Combat.
This shield is destroyed on the caster's next turn.
Required level: :
10|77|144

Normal effects

'Close Combat Invulnerability' state (1 turn)
1 MP (1 turn)
Barricade
Summons Barricade

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

5
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect
Circle of 0 cell

On a target: places a glyph-aura that intercepts damage suffered by allies and applies the Shepherd's Star state on them.

Does not affect the Barricade or the Bastion.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Barrier
/ Distrust
6 Range / 3AP

Applies the Gravity and Barrier states to the target.

If the target is an enemy:
• At the start of their turn, places a glyph that inflicts Earth, Fire, Water and Air damage around the target.
• The glyph only inflicts damage on the enemy if they go through it.
• The states and glyph are removed if the enemy goes through the Barrier or if they die.

If the target is an ally:
• The glyph is placed at end of the caster's turn and only inflicts damage on the first enemy that goes through it.
• The states and glyph are removed if the target or an enemy goes through the Barrier.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
195

Normal effects

'Gravity' state (1 turn)
'Barrier' state (1 turn)
Places a start-of-turn glyph (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect
Ring of 3 cells

details.name: Barrier
details.description:
Applies the Gravity and Barrier states to the target.

If the target is an enemy:
• At the start of their turn, places a glyph that inflicts Earth, Fire, Water and Air damage around the target.
• The glyph only inflicts damage on the enemy if they go through it.
• The states and glyph are removed if the enemy goes through the Barrier or if they die.

If the target is an ally:
• The glyph is placed at end of the caster's turn and only inflicts damage on the first enemy that goes through it.
• The states and glyph are removed if the target or an enemy goes through the Barrier.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
